# 有道精品课

## 54

7. 如图，梯形 \(ABCD\) 中，\(AB \parallel CD\)，若 \(AB = 1\)，  
\(CD = 2\)，\(AC = 6\)，\(S_{\triangle AOB} = 1\)，\(RI \parallel AB =\)  
\(S_{\triangle AOC} =\)  

![梯形图示]

解：  
∵ \(AB \parallel CD\)  
∴ \(\triangle AOB \sim \triangle COD\)  
即 \(\frac{AO}{CO} = \frac{AB}{CD}\)  
∵ \(AB = 1\)，\(CD = 2\)，\(AC = 6\)  
∴ \(\frac{AO}{CO} = \frac{1}{2}\)  
⇒ \(CO = 2AO\)  

又：  
\(AC = AO + CO = 3AO\)  
⇒ \(AO = 6\)，\(AO = 2\)  

又：  
\[\frac{S_{\triangle AOB}}{S_{\triangle COD}} = \left(\frac{AB}{CD}\right)^2 = \left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^2 = \frac{1}{4} = \frac{1}{S_{\triangle COD}}\]

∴ \(S_{\triangle COD} = 4\)  

∴ \(S_{\triangle AOB} = S_{\triangle BOC}\)（同底、同高）  
且底边长为 \(OA = OC = 1\)  
∴ \(S_{\triangle AOB} = S_{\triangle BOC} = 1\)  

∴ \(S_{\triangle AOB} = S_{\triangle BOC} = 1\)  
∴ \(S_{\triangle AOB} = 1\)  
∴ \(S_{\triangle AOB} = 1\)  
且底边长为 \(OA = OC = 1\)  
∴ \(S_{\triangle BOC} = 1\)  
∴ \(S_{\triangle BOC} = 1\)  
且底边长为 \(OA = OC = 1\)  
且底边长为 \(OA = OC = 1\)  
且 \(OA = OC = 1\)  
且 \(OA = OC = 1\)  
∴ \(S_{\triangle AOB} = S_{BOC} = 1\)  
∴ \(S_{\triangle AOB} = S_{BOC} + S_{COD} = 1 + 1 = 2\)
